definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: The organized crime is a public nuisance in international societies.
sentences.chinese: 黑社会组织犯罪是国际社会的公害。

sentences.english: Terrorism has become a common evil of the world and a common enemy of the entire humanity.
sentences.chinese: 恐怖主义已成为国际公害，是全人类的共同敌人。

sentences.english: And solar power absolutely clean, do not produce the public nuisance.
sentences.chinese: 而且太阳能发电绝对干净，不产生公害。

sentences.english: White plastic trash has become a serious source of pollution in the world.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾已经成为全球的白色公害。

sentences.english: Chemical waste is becoming a major public hazard.
sentences.chinese: 化学废品已成为一种主要公害。

sentences.english: Xia Hongfang concerned about Exchange rate every day in the past, now full of pollution-free.
sentences.chinese: 夏红芳过去每天关心汇率，而今满口无公害。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic pollution has been becoming globally harmful to public society not to be ignored.
sentences.chinese: 电磁污染已经成为一种不容忽视的全球性社会公害。

sentences.english: At present the products of lycium barbarum have initiatively reached the ministerial standards issued for non - polluted foods in China.
sentences.chinese: 枸杞产品已基本符合无公害食品的部颁标准。

sentences.english: People in many countries are suffering from public hazards. 6.For example, …
sentences.chinese: 现在许多国家的人民饱尝公害之苦。

sentences.english: Temples of witchcraft are so widespread that they have turned into kinds of social public hazard.
sentences.chinese: 宋代民间淫祠泛滥成灾，成为一种严重的社会公害。

sentences.english: The non-polluted vegetable is an inevitable trend of vegetable production.
sentences.chinese: 无公害蔬菜是蔬菜生产发展的必然趋势。

sentences.english: Jingyan No. 4 was suggested extension during culture produce green vegetable in sunlight greenhouse.
sentences.chinese: 建议在日光温室辣椒无公害生产中推广应用。

sentences.english: Noise exposure in the work-place is the most common preventable hazard to hearing.
sentences.chinese: 工作场所发出的噪音是最常见的可防性听力公害。

sentences.english: Environment-friendly bee product in Zhejiang Province.
Extensive multi-level high-technology development, industrial pollution-free green.
sentences.chinese: 广泛多发展科技水平高，无公害的绿色工业。

sentences.english: This is a pollution-free green food.
sentences.chinese: 这就是无公害绿色食品啊。

definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
to jeopardize/to harm/to endanger/harmful effect/damage/CL:個|个[ge4]
to poison (harm with a toxic substance)/to poison (people's minds)/poisoning
"the four pests", i.e. rats, flies, mosquitoes, and sparrows/see also 打麻雀運動|打麻雀运动[Da3 Ma2 que4 Yun4 dong4]
